trans-unit.source: Contains values that specify the ToggleState of a UI Automation element.
trans-unit.target: 包含指定的 UI 自动化元素 ToggleState 的值。

trans-unit.source: A control must cycle through its ToggleState in this order: On, Off and if supported, Indeterminate.
trans-unit.target: 控件必须循环切换其 ToggleState 按以下顺序︰ 开启、 关闭和如果支持，不确定。

trans-unit.source: The UI Automation element is in an indeterminate state.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化元素处于不确定状态。

trans-unit.source: The Indeterminate property can be used to indicate whether the user has acted on a control.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用不确定的属性，以指示用户是否在控件上循环。

trans-unit.source: For example, a check box can appear checked and dimmed, indicating an indeterminate state.
trans-unit.target: 例如，复选框可以显示选中和灰显，指示不确定状态。

trans-unit.source: Creating an indeterminate state is different from disabling the control.
trans-unit.target: 创建不确定状态是在禁用控件不同。

trans-unit.source: Consequently, a check box in the indeterminate state can still receive the focus.
trans-unit.target: 因此，处于不确定状态的复选框仍可以接收焦点。

trans-unit.source: When the user clicks an indeterminate control the ToggleState cycles to its next value.
trans-unit.target: 当用户单击的不确定控件的 ToggleState 周期将可以为其下一步的值。

trans-unit.source: The UI Automation element is not selected, checked, marked or otherwise activated.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化元素不是选择、 检查、 标记或以其他方式激活。

trans-unit.source: The UI Automation element is selected, checked, marked or otherwise activated.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化元素是选择、 检查、 标记或以其他方式激活。
